verbs.description: macarize (third-person singular simple present macarizes, present participle macarizing, simple past and past participle macarized)

entries.meaning: (transitive, formal, dated) To congratulate or laud; to pronounce blessed or happy.
examples: Couldn't I now say that “happy” is not used to describe things, but when I call someone happy I'm really doing this other thing, pragmatically I'm macarizing him?
